Header: Ministry of Finance & Mass Media Officials Receive 'Army Leadership' Training
Content: A group of 30 state officials of  the Ministry of Finance and Mass Media on Saturday (15) were at Ganemulla Commando Regiment Headquarters to undergo a one day training session on ' Leadership and Positive Thinking' in order to receive a further exposure from the Army. The training touched on possible promotion of leadership qualities, improvement of social discipline, enhancement of vocational training skills, preparation of psychological surroundings to overcome challenges, cultivation of good social perspectives, maintenance of mental balance, etc. A group of Army instructors conducted the training session.
